articles.description: Scotland head coach Steve Clarke prepares to name his provisional 28-man squad for Euro 2024.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Steve Clarke names provisional Scotland squad

articles.description: Scotland boss Steve Clarke is due to name his initial Euro 2024 squad, Mauricio Pochettino leaves Chelsea by mutual consent plus all the latest football news.
articles.title: Scotland set to name Euro 2024 squad and Mauricio Pochettino leaves Chelasea

articles.description: Scotland head coach Steve Clarke includes uncapped duo Ben Doak and Ross McCrorie in his provisional squad for Euro 2024, while there is a return for James Forrest.
articles.title: Euro 2024: Scotland call up Doak, McCrorie and Forrest

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at who could replace Mauricio Pochettino as Chelsea manager.
articles.title: Chelsea: Ruben Amorim, Vincent Kompany, Kieran McKenna to replace Mauricio Pochettino?

articles.description: The Boston Celtics beat the Indiana Pacers 133-128 in overtime in game one of the Eastern Conference Finals.
articles.title: NBA play-offs: Boston Celtics beat Indiana Pacers 133-128 in game one of Eastern Conference Finals

articles.description: Louisville police will investigate if policies were correctly followed in the arrest of world number one Scottie Scheffler at the US PGA Championship.
articles.title: Scottie Scheffler's arrest to be reviewed by Louisville police

articles.description: Keely Hodgkinson stood in total disbelief after winning Olympic silver three years ago - but at Paris 2024 the British 800m star only has gold on her mind.
articles.title: Keely Hodgkinson's rise from Olympic underdog to golden ambitions at Paris 2024

articles.description: England manager talks to BBC sport editor Dan Roan about his provisional 33-man squad for Euro 2024.
articles.title: England Euro 2024 squad: Gareth Southgate explains

articles.description: Are players added to a WhatsApp group? Do they have to wait for the social media post? Or is there another way?
articles.title: Euro 2024: How will Scotland players find out about call-up?

articles.description: England manager right to axe Marcus Rashford and the old guard but defensive woes exposed in Euro 2024 squad
articles.title: England manager Gareth Southgate right to axe Marcus Rashford
